item.title: 投资者权衡美国对委内瑞拉马杜罗的抓捕行动，石油价格下跌
item.description: 石油下跌，因为交易商在权衡美军抓捕委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗对全球原油供应的影响及其对该国能源行业的广泛影响。【原文：Oil dropped as traders weighed the fallout from the capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro by US forces on global crude supply and its wider impact on the nation’s energy sector.】

item.title: 从百度到 Jio，亚洲的 IPO 热潮丝毫没有减弱的迹象
item.description: 2026 年，亚洲股票资本市场有望再创辉煌，这是在该地区股票销售量激增并跃居全球前列的基础上取得的。【原文：Asia’s equity capital markets are expected to have another blockbuster year in 2026, building on a surge that pushed the region to the forefront of global share sales.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴将视觉人工智能引入中国美团的 "美食大战 "中
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）正在推出一项服务，帮助餐厅利用人工智能展示内部装饰，这是该公司在中国餐饮业与美团竞争的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is launching a service to help restaurants use AI to showcase interiors, part of a broader effort to compete with Meituan in the Chinese food and dining sector.】

item.title: 高盛称委内瑞拉石油产量可能长期增长
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The scope for higher Venezuelan oil production in the long run after the US intervention may eventually pressure prices, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 耶伦警告美国经济面临日益严重的 "财政主导 "威胁
item.description: 一个由经济界知名人士组成的小组表示，联邦债务不断增加所带来的长期风险是美国经济面临的首要问题。【原文：A panel of economic luminaries said the long-run risk posed by mounting federal debt represented a paramount problem facing the US economy.】

item.title: 印度天空动荡不安，双头垄断制约航空业蓬勃发展
item.description: 印度两大航空公司的危机暴露了繁荣市场的裂缝，迫使政府进行干预，印度航空业正准备进行一场大清算。【原文：India’s aviation industry is poised for a reckoning after crises at its two dominant carriers exposed cracks in the booming market and forced government intervention.】

item.title: 萨克斯正在洽谈 10 亿美元破产贷款以维持开门营业
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，萨克斯全球企业正在寻求多达 10 亿美元的贷款，以维持企业的运营，作为破产保护申请的一部分，破产保护申请可能会在未来几周内提出。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises is looking to line up a loan of as much as $1 billion to keep the business running as part of a Chapter 11 bankruptcy filing that could happen in coming weeks, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉问题引发股市和债券市场震荡：市场综述
item.description: 美国推翻委内瑞拉总统，引发了新的地缘政治热点，加剧了地区风险，并引发了一些关于石油的问题，全球金融市场开盘后面临恐慌。【原文：Global financial markets face a skittish open after the US ousted Venezuela’s president, triggering a fresh geopolitical flashpoint that intensifies regional risk and raises some questions about oil.】

item.title: 受石油和兰特影响，南非汽油价格跌至四年低点
item.description: 随着全球原油价格下跌和兰特走强，南非汽油价格将跌至近四年来的最低水平。【原文：South Africa’s gasoline price will fall the lowest level in nearly four years following the global drop in crude and a stronger rand.】

item.title: Sky 表示，GetYourGuide 在实现盈利后考虑出售股份
item.description: 据天空新闻报道，软银支持的旅游网站 GetYourGuide 在首次实现盈利后，正在探索出售股份。【原文：SoftBank-backed travel website GetYourGuide is exploring a share sale after it turned profitable for the first time, Sky News reported.】

item.title: 激进组织声称对柏林停电事件负责
item.description: 德国激进分子网络 "火山组织 "声称对周六在柏林西南部发生的纵火袭击负责，这次袭击造成约 50,000 户家庭和 2,000 家企业断电。【原文：The German activist network Volcano Group claimed responsibility for an arson attack that cut power to about 50,000 households and 2,000 businesses in southwest Berlin on Saturday.】

item.title: 卢比奥称石油检疫让美国在后马杜罗时代的委内瑞拉站稳脚跟
item.description: 美国国务卿马可-鲁比奥（Marco Rubio）表示，在总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）下台后，美国将通过石油隔离来从委内瑞拉新领导人那里得到它想要的东西。【原文：Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the US would use an oil quarantine to get what it wants from Venezuela’s new leaders following the ouster of President Nicolas Maduro.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长称政策仍需紧缩
item.description: 捷克央行行长阿莱什-米歇尔（Ales Michl）表示，捷克央行需要维持紧缩货币政策以控制通胀，但今年的利率决策将保留所有选项。【原文：The Czech central bank needs to maintain a tight monetary stance to keep inflation under control but is leaving all options open for interest rate decisions this year, according to Governor Ales Michl.】

item.title: Xreal 对入门级 AR 眼镜进行改版，价格更低，视频效果更好
item.description: Xreal 公司是增强现实眼镜领域的早期先驱，它在未来一周的消费电子展（CES）上发布了一款升级版入门级产品。【原文：Xreal Inc., an early pioneer in augmented-reality glasses, unveiled an upgraded entry-level product at CES, where smart eyewear will be a prevailing theme over the coming week.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮是等待破裂的泡沫吗？历史是这样说的
item.description: 随着人工智能交易不断将股市推向新高，越来越多的投资者开始质疑，我们是否正在经历另一场注定要破灭的金融泡沫。【原文：As the artificial intelligence trade continues to push the stock market to new highs, investors are increasingly asking if we’re living through another financial bubble that’s destined to burst.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉债券投资者押注马杜罗上台后会有更多收益
item.description: 在美国抓捕尼古拉斯-马杜罗之后，委内瑞拉债券有望获得收益，这为价值 600 亿美元证券的投资者长期以来一直押注的潜在政权更迭创造了条件。【原文：Venezuelan bonds are poised to gain after the US captured Nicolás Maduro, setting the stage for a potential regime change that investors in $60 billion worth of securities have long been betting on.】

item.title: 地缘政治纷争加剧，沙特股市创四月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 由于投资者考虑到也门、伊朗和委内瑞拉地缘政治紧张局势可能带来的影响，沙特阿拉伯股市创下近 9 个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Saudi Arabian equities fell the most in almost nine months as investors considered the possible fallout of geopolitical tensions in Yemen, Iran and Venezuela.】

item.title: 全球新兴市场债券退潮或将促进 2026 年的发展
item.description: 基金经理们表示，新兴市场债券可能会在 2026 年得到支持，因为这些证券越来越多地由当地投资者持有，他们面临的货币风险较小，因此是更有弹性的持有者。【原文：Emerging-market bonds are likely to be supported in 2026 as the securities are increasingly owned by local investors who are less exposed to currency risk and are therefore more resilient holders, fund managers say.】

item.title: 法国将禁止进口含有欧盟禁用农药的食品
item.description: 法国计划禁止从南美或其他地区进口含有欧盟禁用杀虫剂的食品。【原文：France plans to prohibit food imports from South America or elsewhere that contain pesticides banned for use in the European Union.】

item.title: 欧佩克+坚持在动荡中保持石油稳定供应的计划
item.description: 在周日的会议上，欧佩克+坚持在第一季度暂停增加供应的计划，因为全球市场面临过剩，而且该组织正在等待美国抓捕委内瑞拉领导人尼古拉斯-马杜罗是否会影响供应的明确消息。【原文：OPEC+ stuck with plans to pause supply increases in the first quarter at a meeting on Sunday, as global markets face a surplus and the group awaits clarity on whether the shock US capture of Venezuela leader Nicolas Maduro will impact supplies.】

item.title: 代表称欧佩克+可能在动荡中确认暂停供应
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+可能会坚持在第一季度暂停增产的计划，他们的政策不会受到委内瑞拉和其他地区风险升级的影响。【原文：OPEC+ will likely stick with plans to pause production increases during the first quarter, their policy unaffected by escalating risks in Venezuela and elsewhere, delegates said.】

item.title: 沙特释放放宽国际债券销售的信号
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯认为，2026 年国际债券销售额将稳定下降，这标志着三年来借贷活动的快速增长可能会停止，而这种增长已使沙特阿拉伯王国成为全球新兴市场中最繁忙的主权发行国之一。【原文：Saudi Arabia sees stable to lower international bond sales in 2026, signaling a possible halt to three years of rapid growth in borrowing activities that have made the kingdom one of the busiest sovereign issuers in global emerging markets.】

item.title: 土耳其外交部敦促在美国攻击委内瑞拉后保持克制
item.description: 土耳其敦促参与美国攻击委内瑞拉行动的各方谨慎行事，并表示愿意帮助解决危机，这是土耳其在行动导致尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolás Maduro）在加拉加斯被捕后发表的第一份声明。【原文：Turkey urged the parties involved in the US attack on Venezuela to exercise caution and said it was ready to help resolve the crisis, issuing its first statement after the operation that resulted in the capture of Nicolás Maduro in Caracas.】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博在地区紧张局势加剧之际抵达中国
item.description: 韩国总统李在明抵达北京，开始他上任以来的首次中国之行，在地区紧张局势不断加剧之际，首尔希望稳定与这个重要经济伙伴的关系。【原文：South Korea’s President Lee Jae Myung has arrived in Beijing for his first China trip since taking office, as Seoul looks to steady ties with a key economic partner at a time of rising regional tensions.】

item.title: 马来西亚、法国、印度抨击 X 公司的 "冒犯性 "Grok 图片
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能聊天机器人 "Grok "在社交媒体平台 "X "上根据用户提示创建了包括未成年人在内的性化图像后，正面临着全球各地越来越多的批评和政府行动的威胁。【原文：Elon Musk’s Grok is facing mounting criticism and threats of government action around the world after the artificial intelligence chatbot created sexualized images, including of minors, on the social media platform X in response to user prompts.】

item.title: 暴风雨袭击加州，洛杉矶面临洪水警报
item.description: 周六晚间，随着两场强风暴向洛杉矶袭来，洛杉矶正在为可能发生的洪水做准备。【原文：Los Angeles was bracing for possible flooding Saturday evening as two powerful storms headed toward the city.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉副总统罗德里格斯被授予临时总统权力
item.description: 委内瑞拉最高法院命令副总统德尔西-罗德里格斯立即以代理身份承担并行使所有总统权力。【原文：Venezuela’s Supreme Court orders Vice President Delcy Rodriguez to immediately assume and exercise all presidential powers in an acting capacity.】

item.title: 科罗纳多的 Curragh 矿业公司暂停运营加剧了其财务困境
item.description: 澳大利亚昆士兰州科罗纳多全球资源公司（Coronado Global Resources Inc.【原文：Coal mining across Coronado Global Resources Inc.’s Curragh complex in Australia’s Queensland state was halted after a worker was killed, adding to woes for the company that’s already dealing with slumping prices.】

item.title: 朝鲜在李熙峰会前一天发射弹道导弹
item.description: 据韩联社和日本海上保安厅报道，在韩国和中国领导人在北京举行峰会的前一天，朝鲜向其东部沿海水域发射了两枚不明弹道导弹。【原文：North Korea fired two unidentified ballistic missiles toward waters off its eastern coast, according to Yonhap News Agency and the Japan Coast Guard, a day before leaders from South Korea and China hold a summit in Beijing.】

item.title: 对人工智能泡沫的担忧和政策分化笼罩着 2026 年的亚洲股市
item.description: 亚洲股市以大幅上涨拉开了新年的序幕，但由于对人工智能泡沫的担忧以及整个地区利率走势的分化，亚洲股市的上涨可能面临阻力。【原文：Asian equities kicked off the new year with sharp gains, but the advance may face headwinds from worries over an artificial-intelligence bubble and diverging interest-rate paths across the region.】
